title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this sweater and love the quality and fit!
items.body: Received sweater fast and in great condition. I love this sweater. It is the perfect weight for spring and summer additions to your outfit. Let's be honest, you aren't buying this to keep you warm. Not what the intent of this is. It is a fashion piece that is fun, well made, and super cute! The color is perfect to match up with just about everything. It is made well and resists snagging quite nicely. I have had it for several months and it has held up perfectly well. I wash it on gentle and hang to dry. No shrinking or pilling. I am 5'8" and it falls about 4-5" below my waist. Read more
items.author: Love to Bake!

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect sweater
items.body: I have these sweaters and four colors. I wear mine for casual and dress up. They look great with jeans or sundresses. Anytime you want something to cover your arms up down a cool day or at a restaurant where it's so cold. My arms brews easily, and this sweater is perfect to wear with just about everything. Read more
items.author: Kathleen A. Lewis

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not so oversized as advertised
items.body: Beautiful sweater, but not as oversized as described. Ordered a medso not too oversized but returned for an XL to get the oversized look. Fabric is light weight, beautiful open knit, dressy to casual. Very happy with the XL. Read more
items.author: carribeangypsy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Summer Cardigan
items.body: I absolutely love this cardigan! I have it in two colors and two different sizes. The color selection is amazing and the color displayed is true to what you'll see when you receive it. They don't stretch so if you really want that slouchy oversized look size up. My only issue with the cardigan is that my rings or bracelets get caught on it when I'm putting it on quickly. It pulls on the knitting but I'm able to pull it around to get it back. It's perfect for those summer nights or those days where it might be a little windy and you just want a little something to cover up. Read more
items.author: Patricia A Natti

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater! Soft, comfortable & fun to wear
items.body: After seeing the models wearing oversized crochet cardigans that were featured with shorts on the Chanel 2024 runway show this year. I fell in love with the look, and knew I wanted to find an oversized crochet cardigan to wear this summer with my shorts, jeans, tanks & T-shirts. I am so glad that I found this crochet sweater. The cuffed & balloon sleeves, kimono style gives it an oversized look & the crochet big holes pattern is exactly what I wanted. It came in 28 fun colors. I decided on the light purple color. So glad I did. It is a soft lilac, so pretty & the perfect pop of color. Not only is the sweater very pretty & fun to wear. The material is very soft making it very comfortable to wear. According to the size chart I would have been a size small. I got the sweater in the medium size because I wanted it to be oversized. The medium size is perfect. I am 5’4, the length is great. The bottom of the sweater goes a little below the bottom edge of my shorts. Read more
items.author: A Baruch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect lightweight sweater
items.body: Love this sweater for spring and summer. It is very lightweight and easy to throw in a big handbag or back of your car. It is warm enough to keep the chill of the shoulders and arms but won't make you hot. I've bought toe in different colors. Read more
items.author: Mary Williams

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent for the price
items.body: This is super light weight and will snag easily. It’s definitely on the cheap end but it looks nice and it’s great for summer layering when you want the look of a layer without the warmth Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish
items.body: My daughter loves the cardigan, she wears it a lot, it’s very stylish, washes ok in washing machine, did not shrink in the dryer, length is good, my daughter is tall, so liked how long it is. Read more
items.author: Zuls

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Blue, Apricot, Black, Camel, Coffee, Orange, Dark Red, Army&green, Red, Beige Grey, Navy, Khaki, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
